Articles.Content:
Hi guys. My girlfriend wants to create KSP-themed cross stitch (needle-point) images. I am curious, how much would you pay for something like this? It will come framed, marque with glass protection. Thanks!

![zgjO4Vw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zgjO4Vw.jpg)

- - - Updated - - -

Or this?

![Uq6Urf6.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Uq6Urf6.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-26T13:47:59Z" title="06/26/2015 01:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 26, 2015</time> by rodion\_herrera**

Unfortunately you'd not be able to sell them without consent from Squad as they own the Kerbal IP, but it doesn't hurt to[**get in touch with them**](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/?page_id=23)and ask.
Ok thanks for the advice! I will get in touch with them soon.

> 
> Unfortunately you'd not be able to sell them without consent from Squad as they own the Kerbal IP, but it doesn't hurt to[**get in touch with them**](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/?page_id=23)and ask.

Or you could "give them away" and accept a small "donation" for your "new computer" \*wink\* \*wink\* /joking.

> 
> Unfortunately you'd not be able to sell them without consent from Squad as they own the Kerbal IP, but it doesn't hurt to[**get in touch with them**](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/en/?page_id=23)and ask.

They *own* every image with the little green dudes in it? Or just physical merch with Kerbals on it?
Just physical merch I think, so other people can't profit from the Kerbal brand without Squads permission.
